Author: pg
Content: If they had left out Arc, it would have actually been a good idea.

Author: ewheeler
Content:
I have no experience with grant proposals or grant stipulations and nobody I've spoken with seems to have an answer. 
Would it be possible to get a grant with terms for developing a software tool that I could then sell as a commercial product?
One suggestion was to apply for a grant with language only about researching the effectiveness of a tool, and then use the funds to develop the tool.

Author: ewheeler
Title: Will grant $ from a non-profit foundation preclude profitability?

Author: notabel
Content: I had a Logo class in 4th grade (10yrs), which led me to Scheme the next year.  So, yes, it does happen.
